name: Flamoos
description:
Take on the role of a cheeky fox or a bionic bear to bring back to King Flamoo his most valuable offspring before time runs out and use their power to prevent the opponent from scoring.
Steer clear of the pesky bunny. Along with the opponent he will try to spoil your plans to become the mighty winner!

FLAMOOS is a lighthearted pick-up-and-deliver multiplayer game.

Watch the 12-second teaser.

Original soundtrack available on Bandcamp
